title: "BlueFire AI Appoints Fintech Connex as Adviser"
excerpt: "Building on an already successful relationship, BlueFire AI, the award-winning provider of artificial intelligence for capital markets participants, appoints Fintech Connex as its adviser. The two firms will work closely together as Bluefire builds on its excellent traction with clients and investors."
